bill.title: California Small Business COVID-19 Relief Grant Program: income tax: gross income: exclusion: small business grants.
bill.description: An act to add and repeal Article 8 (commencing with Section 12100.80) of Chapter 1.6 of Part 2 of Division 3 of Title 2 of the Government Code, and to add and repeal Sections 17158 and 24312 of, and to add and repeal Article 8 (commencing with Section 19294) of Chapter 5 of Part 10.2 of Division 2 of, the Revenue and Taxation Code, relating to small businesses, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after January 16.
Read first time.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 22. Noes 8. Page 76.)
Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 22. Noes 2. Page 89.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
Referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Joint Rule 62(a) suspended. (Ayes 54. Noes 15. Page 328.)
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Coauthors revised.
Assembly Rule 96 and 63 suspended.
Withdrawn from committee.
Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 77. Noes 0. Page 436.) Ordered to the Senate.
In Senate. Concurrence in Assembly amendments pending.
Assembly amendments concurred in. (Ayes 38. Noes 0. Page 306.) Ordered to engrossing and enrolling.
Enrolled and presented to the Governor at 5:30 p.m.
Approved by the Governor.
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Chapter 7, Statutes of 2021.

votes.desc: Unfinished Business SB87 Caballero et al. Concurrence
SB 87 Caballero Senate Third Reading By TING
